mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score(a_id, score , is_break_record, create_time, edit_time) VALUES (#{athlete.athleteId}, #{score},#{isBreakRecord}, #{createTime}, #{editTime})
mapper.select: SELECT s.score_id, s.score, s.a_id, a.athlete_id, i.item_id FROM `score` s INNER JOIN `athlete` a ON s.a_id = a.athlete_id INNER JOIN `item` i ON a.i_id = i.item_id WHERE i.item_id = #{itemId} ORDER BY s.score ${condition} Limit ${limitAmount}

SELECT s.score_id, s.score, s.is_break_record, s.edit_time, a.athlete_id, i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_sex, u.user_id, u.user_no, u.nickname, u.user_sex, t.team_id, t.team_name FROM `score` s INNER JOIN `athlete` a ON s.a_id = a.athlete_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON a.u_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN `team` t ON u.t_id = t.team_id INNER JOIN `item` i ON a.i_id = i.item_id WHERE s.score_id = #{scoreId}

SELECT se.season_name, t.team_name, u.user_no, u.nickname, u.user_sex, i.item_name, s.score, s.is_break_record, s.edit_time, u2.nickname AS scorer FROM `score` s INNER JOIN `athlete` a ON s.a_id = a.athlete_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON a.u_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN `team` t ON u.t_id = t.team_id INNER JOIN `item` i ON a.i_id = i.item_id INNER JOIN `season` se ON i.se_id = se.season_id INNER JOIN `user` u2 ON i.u_id = u2.user_id
AND i.item_id = #{score.athlete.item.itemId} AND u.nickname LIKE '%${score.athlete.user.nickname}%'
AND se.season_id=#{score.athlete.item.season.seasonId}
ORDER BY i.item_name, s.score
